Dashboard.p-description: Here is what’s happening with your projects today:
Dashboard.licence-expiry-description: Your membership with us has expired. Please contact sales at lit@litdata.org to renew and continue enjoying exclusive benefits.

user-action.title: Add User
user-action.description: Efficiently include a new user to your platform.

company-action.title: Create Company
company-action.description: Quickly add a new company to the system.

filter-action.title: Filter Report
filter-action.description: Customized report tailored to your analysis needs.

crosstab-action.title: Crosstab Report
crosstab-action.description: Seamlessly craft a detailed report for data exploration.

last-2-reports.empty: You haven't received any reports yet. Stay tuned for valuable insights as your reports start rolling in.

last-5-reports.empty: Create your first report using the quick actions above. Get started now!

last-report-generated.empty: <header>No reports yet</header><description>Create your first report using the quick actions above. Get started now!</description>

dialog.title: Delete Chart from Dashboard
dialog.text: Are you sure you want to delete this chart from your dashboard? Don't worry, this action will not alter the data in your generated reports.
dialog.limit-message: You've reached the maximum limit of 6 widgets on your dashboard. Consider removing existing widgets.

SignUpForm.toast-success: Your request has been recieved successfully, wait for a confirmation email.
SignUpForm.span-test: Request an account for testing purposes
SignUpForm.button-account: Already have an account? Sign in

Report.title: Custom Reports
Report.empty: You haven't created any reports yet. Get started by clicking the 'New report' button. Choose between Filter or Crosstab reports to tailor your insights.
Report.share-drawer: Select all companies and their members
Report.share-tooltip-client: This report is shared with you.

SelectSurvey.subheader: You are about to delete this report. This action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to proceed?
SelectSurvey.missing-permissions: You cannot create a new report because your company does not have the necessary permissions.

DeleteDialog.subheader: You are about to delete this report. This action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to proceed?

Banner.title: Dive deeper into the metrics that matter to you
Banner.description: Custom reports lets you choose the metrics you want to dig deeper into so you can get more from your data. Start by creating a new filter.

Filters.filter-by-under-18: By children under 18 living at home
Filters.filter-by-location: By whether they live at home, apt, etc.
Filters.filter-by-education: By highest level of education completed
Filters.filter-by-government-assistance: By type of government assistance received
Filters.description: You do not have any filters configured.

DeleteDialog.subheader: You are about to delete this filter. This action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to proceed?

step-0.title: Welcome to the Report Generator!
step-0.content: Explore our intuitive step-by-step report generator. We guide you on customizing your report and obtaining valuable insights.

step-1.title: Naming and saving your report
step-1.content: Use the <generate>Generate report</generate> button to generate and export your report in PDF, Excel or CSV.

step-2.title: Custom and create your Filters
step-2.content: Locate your created filters in the sidebar. Refine your results by adding new filters with the <add>Add Filter</add> button.

step-3.title: Visualize the data clearly
step-3.content: See concise summaries for each question, including a bar chart and metrics.

Crosstab.toast-error: You must select both questions to proceed
Crosstab.description: You do not have any crosstab configured.
Crosstab.empty: You haven't created any crosstab yet. Get started by clicking the 'Add' button in the sidebar. Choose at least one start date and select the questions you want to crossover.

step-0.title: Get help
step-0.content: You can revisit the usage instructions from this icon. If you have any further questions, please contact <support>support@litdata.org</support>, and we'll be happy to assist you.

step-1.title: Your analytics hub!
step-1.content: Welcome to your centralized analytics dashboard. Unleash the power of data with intuitive report management. Dive into insights effortlessly.

step-2.title: Report details at a glance
step-2.content: Easily identify your report with its <title>Title</title> and <date>Creation date</date> displayed prominently on each card.

step-3.title: Report type Indication
step-3.content: Each card specifies the report type (<type>Filter or Crosstab</type>) A quick reference to streamline your analysis.

step-4.title: Swift report management
step-4.content: Efficiently manage with quick action buttons. <duplicate>Duplicate</duplicate> or <delete>Delete</delete> a report with a single click for easy control.

step-5.title: Start creating your report
step-5.content: Click <new>New Report</new> to begin. Choose between Filter or Crosstab to tailor your report type.

CreateReportDialog.subheader: You cannot create a new report because your company does not have the necessary permissions.

AccountPanel.profileDesc: Update your profile to make it easier for other users to find

PasswordDialog.title: Change password
PasswordDialog.validPass: Use a password at least 8 characters long containing at least one alphabet and one number.

Client-Home.notification: Your account is pending authorization. Our team is diligently reviewing your information to ensure a secure and seamless experience. Please allow some time for this process. We'll notify you as soon as your account is approved and ready for access. We appreciate your patience.

Not-Found.description: Hmm...this page doesn't exist. Try searching for something else!

dialog-create.check: (This option will create an account with an active subscription.)
dialog-create.password-info: Use a password at least 8 characters long containing at least one alphabet and one number.

dialog-delete.title: Confirm user deletion
dialog-delete.description: You are about to delete this user. This action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to proceed?

dialog-delete.title: Confirm company deletion
dialog-delete.description: You are about to delete this company. This action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to proceed?

ConfirmDialog.alert-desc: The modifications you're about to make are irreversible. Please proceed with caution and ensure that you are absolutely certain about the changes you are making. Take a moment to review your decisions before proceeding. Are you sure you want to proceed?
ConfirmDialog.toast-sync: Your changes have been applied. Please note that it may take a few minutes for the updates to take effect.

ForgotPass.reset-desc: Enter the email address associated with your account and we will send you a link to reset your password.
ForgotPass.reset-verify-desc: We have sent you an email with a link to recover your password.

ChangePass.expired: The link to change the password has expired or is invalid
